column2: A unit is a soldier or group of soldiers occupying a single space.
A tile is a square space in the game along with the buildings or trees that are on it.
Unit type. All-round infantry unit.
Unit type. Soldier with a heavy machinegun. Possible alternative name: Commando. Current translation: Atirador pesado
Unit type. Soldier with a long-distance mortar. Possible alternative name: Artillerist. Current translation: Morteiro
Unit type. Armored tank with a heavy cannon.
Unit type. Can build settlements. Current translation: Pioneiro
Unit type. Fast but fragile infantry unit.
Tile type. Current translation: Grama
Tile type. Left over after grass was destroyed. Current translation: Terra
Tile type.
Tile type. Current translation: Pedra
Tile type. Current translation: cordilheira
Tile type.
Tile type.
Tile type.
Tile type. The most important tile type in the game. Has one or more tall buildings on it.
Tile type. Has smaller buildings than the City. Current translation: Vilarejo
Tile type. Usually built near enemy borders.
Tile type. Produces tanks and generates income.
Tile type. Produces military units.
Tile type. Produces air units.
Tile type. Surrounded by Soil or Crops.
Tile type. Fertile land where Crops can grow.
Tile type. Similar to a Soil tile but with crops on it.
Tile type. Current translation: Trincheiras
Weather effect.
Weather effect. The affected area is extremely cold. Current translation: Tempestade de frio
Weather effect. The affected area is on fire.
Weather effect. The affected area is extremely dry. Current translation: Seca extrema
A lethal gas.
Ability name. Causes multiple units to focus on one enemy.
Ability name. Causes a unit to guard a space.
Ability name. Causes a unit to fire explosive rounds at an adjacent space. Current translation: Bombardeio
Ability name. Causes a unit to fire mortar rounds at long range.
Ability name. Causes a tile to change owners.
Ability name. Causes a tile to change type or to increase in size. Current translation: Melhorar
Phase of the game where players give orders to their units and tiles.
Phase of the game where units and tiles execute their orders.
Phase of the game where Gas and certain weather effects deal damage.
Phase of the game where certain tiles produce income.
Phase of the game where weather effects change.
